resources.string: Cilia Local Trader is a tool that allows buyers and sellers to trade bitcoin for cash. Trading requires buyers and sellers to meet physically as part of the exchange.
Cilia only acts as a means of communication between two parties, and is not in any way responsible for any actions taken by the trading parties before, during, or after physical meetings.

The Cilia software guides the trading parties, but they themselves are responsible for exchanging the correct amount of cash and bitcoins, checking the validity thereof and to adhere to all applicable laws.
Cilia charges 1% fee on every transaction. This helps fund product development and support.
Mua và bán Bitcoin với VNĐ

If you continue, you agree to proceed to the Swish BTC Store, a third party service. All your interactions with the Swish BTC Store are outside of Cilia Wallet’s control and are subject to Swish BTC Store’s User Agreement and Privacy Policy. Please read them carefully before providing any personal information. Cilia Wallet won’t provide any personal information to the Swish BTC Store. All information that you may provide to the Swish BTC Store will be subject to Swish BTC Store’s Privacy Policy and will not be collected, stored, or used by Cilia Wallet.\n\nMYCELIUM WALLET ACCEPTS NO RESPONSIBILITY AND WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE WHATSOEVER SUFFERED AS A RESULT OF ACCESSING, USE OF, OR RELIANCE UPON SWISH BTC STORE’S INFORMATION AND SERVICES.
